vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Jones & Carter, Inc to provide engineering services for storm drainage and erosion control improvements at 11 locations within the City of Dallas (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $874,924.00 - Financing: Flood Control (D) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($420,926.00), Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($250,348.00), Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities (2012 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($136,253.00), and Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($67,397.00)
vote.description: Authorize a professional services contract with Jones & Carter, Inc to provide engineering services for storm drainage and erosion control improvements at 11 locations within the City of Dallas (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $874,924.00 - Financing: Flood Control (D) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($420,926.00), Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($250,348.00), Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities (2012 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($136,253.00), and Storm Drainage Management Capital Construction Fund ($67,397.00)
